wikipedia_page.main: Mildred Richardson (19 July 1893  – 28 June 1987) was a British competitive pair skater. With her husband  Tyke Richardson, she represented Great Britain at the 1924 Winter Olympics, where they were placed 8th.

Figure skating at the 1924 Winter Olympics – Pairs

response: With his wife, Mildred Richardson, he represented Great Britain at the 1924 Winter Olympics, where they placed 8th.
